body: Add latest version of IPOPT. Relax METIS version linking requirements after looking at IPOPT source code and METIS 5 manual, and discovering that the only METIS API calls in IPOPT are to functions that have the same call signature (and semantics) in METIS 4 and METIS 5.
title: ipopt: add version 3.12.8, relax metis version requirements
